long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Portal enables you to search multiple search engines simultaneously from one convenient location. You can simply enter your search query and get instant results from popular search engines like Google, DuckDuckGo, and more. bing. Choose from different search types including web, images, maps, videos, and shopping to find what you're looking for. You can easily switch between search engines and search types with just a few clicks. Save time and effort by using the collective power of multiple search engines with Serach Portal!
